body.p:
Beriah Magoffin
Governor of the Comth. of ky
To all who shall see these presents Greeting

Where as A Judgment has been rendered by the Louisville City Court ^for $200^ against R C. Hick. And whereas it appears from satisfactory evidence that the case of said Schlich presents strong considerations for the interposition and indulgence of the Executive -- Now Know ye, that in consideration of the premises and by virtue of the power vested in me by the Constitution I have thought proper to Respite and do by these presents stay and respite the collectiion of said Judgment save fees & cost, for the term of twelve months from the date hereof, and do enjoin all officers to respect this Respite & govern themselves accordingly. In Testimoney whereof I have herunto set my hand & caused the Seal of the Comth. to be affixed at Frankfort on the 14th day of Aug. in the year of our Lord one Thousand Eight hundred and sixty one & in the 70th year of the Comth

By the Governor
Tho B. Monroe Jr. Sec: of State
A Copy
Att O H Strattan C
